parameters.query:
=SELECT 
  -- Project Info
  kp.id as project_id,
  kp.uuid as project_uuid,
  kp.project_name,
  kp.main_keyword,
  kp.status as project_status,
  kp.created_at as project_created_at,
  
  -- Keyword Stats
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM keyword_results kr WHERE kr.project_id = kp.id) as keyword_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM keyword_results kr WHERE kr.project_id = kp.id AND kr.search_intent IS NOT NULL) as filtered_keyword_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM keyword_results kr WHERE kr.project_id = kp.id AND kr.opportunity_score IS NOT NULL AND kr.opportunity_score > 0) as scored_keyword_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM keyword_results kr WHERE kr.project_id = kp.id AND kr.content_priority IS NOT NULL) as strategy_keyword_count,
  
  -- Competitor Stats
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM competitor_data cd WHERE cd.project_id = kp.id) as competitor_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM competitor_data cd WHERE cd.project_id = kp.id AND cd.word_count IS NOT NULL AND cd.word_count > 0) as scraped_competitor_count,
  
  -- SERP Stats
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM serp_features sf WHERE sf.project_id = kp.id) as serp_feature_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM paa_data pd WHERE pd.project_id = kp.id) as paa_count
  
FROM keyword_projects kp
WHERE kp.id = {{ $json.projectId }}
